mdRecord.dcterms:description: Series of observations in reaction to each other, using song lyrics [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

Hey now. Hey now. This is what dreams are made of. | I got somebody to love | SomeBODY once told me the world is gonna roll me | Roll one, smoke one. When you live like this you're supposed to party. | Party like a rock star, dude! | IT'S MY PARTY AND I'LL CRY IF I WANT TO! |
